HomePage.title: AICON MAC MODELS - Precision in Miniature
HomePage.description: Crafting intricate architectural models with unparalleled detail and artistic excellence.

ProjectsPage.heroDescription: A carefully curated exhibition of architectural miniatures, each piece representing the pinnacle of precision craftsmanship and artistic vision.
ProjectsPage.commissionDescription: Ready to see your architectural vision transformed into a museum-quality miniature?

CareersPage.heroDescription: Become part of a distinguished team where architectural vision meets artisan craftsmanship. Shape the future of miniature architecture with precision, passion, and purpose.
CareersPage.whyJoinDescription: Where traditional craftsmanship meets contemporary innovation in the pursuit of architectural miniature excellence.
CareersPage.joinTeamDescription: Submit your application to become part of our master craftsmen collective
CareersPage.ctaDescription: Join a team where your artistic vision shapes architectural miniatures that will be treasured for generations. Your precision, our platform.

creativeMastery.title: Creative Mastery
creativeMastery.desc: Work on prestigious architectural projects with cutting-edge tools and materials

precisionExcellence.title: Precision Excellence
precisionExcellence.desc: Develop expertise in micro-scale craftsmanship and advanced manufacturing techniques

recognitionGrowth.title: Recognition & Growth
recognitionGrowth.desc: Professional development programs and opportunities to showcase your artistry globally

collaborativeAtelier.title: Collaborative Atelier
collaborativeAtelier.desc: Join a team of passionate artisans, architects, and creative technologists

innovationLab.title: Innovation Lab
innovationLab.desc: Access to latest 3D printing, laser cutting, and digital fabrication technologies

artisanCulture.title: Artisan Culture
artisanCulture.desc: A workplace that values craftsmanship, attention to detail, and artistic vision

precision.title: Precision as Philosophy
precision.desc: Every millimeter matters. We believe that exceptional architecture deserves exceptional representation.

innovation.title: Innovation Through Tradition
innovation.desc: Combining time-honored craftsmanship techniques with cutting-edge digital fabrication.

collaboration.title: Collaborative Excellence
collaboration.desc: Ideas flow freely in our open studio environment where every voice contributes to creative solutions.

growth: Apprentice Artisan → Journey Craftsperson → Master Model Maker

ContactPage.heroDescription: Transform your architectural vision into museum-quality miniature masterpieces. Our artisans combine traditional craftsmanship with cutting-edge precision.
ContactPage.commissionRequestDescription: Begin your journey to architectural miniature excellence
ContactPage.ctaDescription: Every architectural masterpiece begins with a conversation. Let's discuss how we can transform your vision into tangible artistry.

awardWinning.title: Award-Winning Craftsmanship
awardWinning.desc: International recognition for precision and artistry
